Initial commit: Z-Image-Turbo Web UI

- Datetime-based filename generation
- Base64 image encoding for web display
- Responsive design with gradient UI

Technical Stack:
- Flask backend with Z-Image-Turbo model
- Vanilla JavaScript frontend
- Sequential CPU Offload for memory optimization
- Attention slicing and VAE slicing enabled
